name: Candy Warfare
description:
Forget about FPS like Call Of Duty or Battlefield, the next era of FPS is Candy Warfare!

If you are hit, you die, so be unpredictable and frenetic!

When you execute the game you must put your name and hit play, then straight to action so be prepared!

-CONTROLS-

W,A,S,D to move

Left Mouse to Shoot

W,A,S,D + Shift to run

Spacebar to jump

-YOU CAN-

Make videos on YouTube, streams and anything except redistribuite it.

-HAVE FUN-
